channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Manhattan Has More Secure Buildings Than Most Cities. That Wasn’t Enough.
item.description: Decades of threats have heightened security in New York City. But Monday’s attack in a Park Avenue office building shows the limits of preparedness.

item.title: With Epstein, Trump Betrays His Brand. His Supporters Notice.
item.description: Trump’s handling of the Epstein issue runs counter to the sense that he is an outsider fighting against a hostile class of insiders.

item.title: What is the U.S. destroying $9.7 million worth of? Find out in the quiz
item.description: This week was full of mysteries. If you're a super sleuth who followed the news, you'll be well on your way to a perfect score.

item.title: The New Tariff Twist, and a $250 million A.I. Job Offer

item.title: France, U.K., others plan to recognize a Palestinian state. What does that change?
item.description: The recent push by several countries to recognize a state of Palestine is largely symbolic, but it carries diplomatic and potentially legal weight.

item.title: Fleeing Domestic Violence, and the Russian Advance
item.description: “I wanted something decent,” said a woman at a shelter near Ukraine’s border with Russia. “But this is how it turned out.”
